group_1.narration: "Your behavior today was extremely risky, Komachi."
"...Your circumstances are quite different from mine."
"Mustering up half-hearted bravery could've@easily threatened to worsen your past wounds."
"I think that,@rather than wracking your brain over things@too seriously and pushing yourself..."
"If you can find a place where you can rest easy,@then that's good enough."
[textBlack:"A place where we can rest easy..."]
"A comfortable home, where even@those with a maladroit sense of distance..."
"...can relax and spend time in peace, too."

group_1.textLeft: Mihono's engrossed in her film as usual, I see.

group_1.textRight: So I think it's safe to assume...
...that she didn't hear any of our embarassing@conversation just now.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, I thought it was a serious conversation.
...Was it that embarassing?
W-what's the matter, Mihono?!
No, no. The club accomplishments!@OUR club accomplishments!
The reason we even started filming that movie in@the first place!
Yes! To provide evidence of our club's@accomplishments to the school!
We were trying to secure funding for next year!

group_1.textRight: Oh, right, our alibi. Now that you mention it...

group_1.textLeft: Kira-senpai! You!@...Could still stand to mince words a little more!
At any rate...
Now that the festival screening is cancelled, our@accomplishments have slid back to zero!
Yeah...
We even got an extra budget for that enormous@proposal, too.
But now we've wiped everything, down to the last@frame of footage.
Including everything in Sakurako's database,@just to be safe.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm looking forward to the enormous letter of@apology you'll write, Mihono.

group_1.textLeft: Uuurgh...@I can write as many of those as we need, no problem.
But what's more important is that if we don't get@next year's budget approved...
[chara:303901:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]...our precious Historical Research Club is going to@get shut down!
We still have time until the cultural festival.@Should we film a different movie...?
Yeah, agreed...
...Well, I'm sure we'll think of another project soon@enough.

group_1.textRight: ...We caused a lot of trouble for Mihono too,@these past few weeks.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry we didn't tell you about the diary...

group_1.textRight: Huh...? Oh, no, I'm not bothered by that at all!
Keeping it a secret from the heroine was a good@choice! I would've done the same thing, myself!

group_1.textLeft: ...Thanks.

group_1.textRight: I'm sure we're all tired from running around so much@on our day off.
So let's each search for a home where we can rest@easy.

group_1.textLeft: Home...?@Rest easy??
I've already found mine.

group_1.textRight: ...Have you, now? That was rather fast.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
...Of course, it's still just a "provisional" club room.
